After half a year using Ozempic for Type 2 Diabetes, here's my honest review:

The positives: my A1C dropped from 8.9 to 6.1 and my doctor is thrilled. My doctor is very pleased with these results the food noise in my head is completely gone

The negative aspects: the nausea is real and it can be debilitating at times. Some days are worse than others.

I'm managing by anti-nausea medication from my doctor.

Overall, I would recommend discussing this with your doctor.
